accelerator.desc: As you have already learned, light blue energy is associated most with time and its manipulation. By concentrating this energy and binding it in a crystal structure - a vast improvement over the previous design you scribbled out after slipping and knocking yourself unconscious on a cauldron - you might be able to set up a localized field in which time progresses at a greatly increased rate.
accelerator.note: Comes in various tiers, each tier being twice as powerful as the last Localized effects may be ineffective over things whose essence is less concentrated

guardian.desc: Too often you come home to find your constructions damaged or outright destroyed - or just half of your valuables missing - because someone snooping around your property helped themselves to your stocks or got too close to dangerous machinery. Sometimes you are fortunate enough to have those in a position of power apply magical protection spells over your territory, but they are often of fairly limited range, and the less scrupulous enforcers will demand a steep payment from you. Finally, however, you can protect yourself by applying a smaller version of that yourself; each stone emits an aura that prevents those you do not trust from helping themselves to your resources or your structures.
guardian.note: Protects against block placement and breaking, and the opening of GUIs within a %d block range Owners and admins always have permissions; the owner can also use /guardstone add/remove <player> to allow/deny others access
